sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Removes the glide.awa.agent.capacity.calculation.legacy property if it is found. The legacy capacity calculation that was enabled by this property is no longer supported by the the AWA code base.</description>
        <name>Remove AWA legacy capacity property</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var logName = "Remove AWA legacy capacity property";
var props = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
var deleteCount = 0;
props.addQuery("name", "glide.awa.agent.capacity.calculation.legacy");
props.query();
gs.log("Found " + props.getRowCount() + " AWA properties to delete.", logName);
if (props.next()) {
	if (!props.deleteRecord()) {
		gs.logError("Failure deleting sys_property record for: " + props.getValue('name', logName));
	}
	deleteCount++;
}
gs.log("Successfully deleted " + deleteCount + " AWA sys_properties records", logName);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-01-21 13:13:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9359717f734101104a905ee515f6a7b4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove AWA legacy capacity property</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9359717f734101104a905ee515f6a7b4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-21 13:22:29</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
